message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $12000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering its value to you is $8000. Let's make this deal happen!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the opportunity, $12000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. This is my best offer, and it's fair considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To better align with your budget while still ensuring a fair deal, I propose an adjusted price of $9500 for the product. This is a middle ground between our previous offers, and I believe it reflects the product's true value to you. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $9500 is still a bit more than I can comfortably afford. I'm willing to go to $9000 for the product. This is my final offer.  If you're not able to accept, I will need to move forward with another option.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $9200. This price reflects a compromise that respects both the value of the product to you and the worth of the product to me. I hope this offer will be acceptable, allowing us to complete this transaction.
